children.value: can be customized through slots. In this case, you need to use
to manually control the display of the menu.

props.code:
<z-dropdown-menu>
   <z-dropdown-item v-model="value1" :options="option1" />
   <z-dropdown-item title="Filter" ref="item">
     <z-cell center title="Option 1">
       <template #right-icon>
         <z-switch v-model="switch1" />
       </template>
     </z-cell>
     <z-cell center title="Option 2">
       <template #right-icon>
         <z-switch v-model="switch2" />
       </template>
     </z-cell>
     <view style="padding: 10rpx 32rpx">
       <z-button
         type="primary"
         block
         round
         style="height: 80rpx"
         @click="onConfirm"
       >
         confirm
       </z-button>
     </view>
   </z-dropdown-item>
</z-dropdown-menu>

children.value: The selected color of menu titles and options can be customized through the
The scrolling threshold can be customized through the

props.code:
<z-dropdown-menu swipe-threshold="4">
   <z-dropdown-item v-model="value1" :options="option1" />
   <z-dropdown-item v-model="value2" :options="option2" />
   <z-dropdown-item v-model="value2" :options="option2" />
   <z-dropdown-item v-model="value2" :options="option2" />
   <z-dropdown-item v-model="value2" :options="option2" />
</z-dropdown-menu>

children.value: The selected state color of menu titles and options
Menu expansion direction, optional value is
animation duration in milliseconds, set to 0 to disable animation
whether to display the mask layer
Whether to close the menu after clicking the overlay
Whether to close the menu after clicking on an external element
Scroll threshold, when the number of options exceeds the threshold and the total width exceeds the menu bar width, horizontal scrolling can be performed
The value corresponding to the currently selected item
Triggered when clicking an option causes value to change
Triggered when the menu bar is opened
Triggered when closing the menu bar
Triggered after the menu bar is opened and the animation ends
Triggered after the menu bar is closed and the animation ends
Through ref, you can get the DropdownMenu instance and call the instance method.
Close the display state of all menus
Through ref, you can get the DropdownItem instance and call the instance method.
Switch the menu display state, pass
to hide, pass no parameter to negate

The component provides the following CSS variables, which can be used to customize styles. For usage, please refer to

html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}
